thread.title: Y-3’s Sport Approach Low Arrives in New Black Colorway
thread.title_full: Y-3’s Sport Approach Low Arrives in New Black Colorway

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Y-3’s Sport Approach Low Arrives in New Black Colorway
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Y-3
Model: Sport Approach Low
Key Features: Soft-shelled overlay, welded TPU, midfoot support Torsion system, vented toe box, Boost tooling, 3M detailing.
Release Date: Available now.
Price: $350 USD
Availability: You can pick up your size of Y-3’s new low-top Sport Approach today through select brand providers such as Revive .
Editor’s Notes: For SS17, Y-3 introduces a new low-top variant to the Sport Approach, here offered up in a classic black and white color combination.
And for another futuristic sneaker from Y-3, take a look at the recently released Arc RC. 
Subscribe to Highsnobiety’s sneaker chatbot on Facebook to receive lightning quick updates on release dates, sneaker street style, shopping tips and more.
